tr.td: Reference( US Core Organization Profile | Patient | RelatedPerson)

td.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : left; background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px

description.value: The Coverage profile groups the policy and authorization acts within a Payers Section to order the payment sources. The Coverage.identifier is the ID from the patient's insurance card.
